Method Detail

initialize

public static int initialize()
Try to get the configuration File and Initialize the BoxList and their ServiceLocators (WebServices Connexion)

Returns:
initialization status return 1, if all is fine return 0, if the configuration File hasn't been found return -1, if we have a caught exception
